message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at a steal! I'm willing to part with it for $200. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 is my ideal price, I could be persuaded to go as low as $170 for you. This product is really worth it, and I wouldn't want you to miss out on such a great deal!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $120.  This is my final offer.
